meanings.definition: The quality or state of being frizzy.
meanings.sent1: Her hair's frizziness made it difficult to manage.
meanings.sent2: I used a special serum to control the frizziness of my hair.
meanings.sent3: The frizziness of her hair seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The frizziness of the wool sweater reminded me of a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The frizziness of the fabric added a unique texture to the dress.

meanings.sent1: Despite using a straightener, her hair's frizziness always returned.
meanings.sent2: Humidity often exacerbates the frizziness of curly hair.
meanings.sent3: The frizziness of the dog's fur made it look like a fluffy toy.
meanings.sent4: The frizziness of the tree branches in the wind created a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The frizziness of the paintbrush strokes added an interesting texture to the artwork.
